mapper.sql: task.ID_ as taskId, pl_cc.id as consultId, project.id as projectId, project.`code` as projectCode, project.project_name AS projectName, process.process_instance_id as processInstanceId, task.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as processStateCode, sdd.item_value as currentProcessStateCode, pl_cc.name as customerName, assignee.name as executor, pl_cc.business_origin as businessOrigin, manager.name as customerManager

INNER JOIN pub_project_process as process on process.process_instance_id=task.PROC_INST_ID_ and process.process_type='0' INNER JOIN pub_project as project on project.id=process.project_id INNER JOIN pl_consult as pl_cc ON pl_cc.process_instance_id=process.process_instance_id INNER JOIN sys_role r on r.nid = task.DESCRIPTION_ INNER JOIN sys_dict_detail as sdd on sdd.item_code = pl_cc.`status` INNER JOIN sys_user as assignee ON assignee.user_name = task.ASSIGNEE_ INNER JOIN sys_user as manager ON manager.id = pl_cc.customer_manager
